properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 2:05AM EST until February 8 at 3:10AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Virginia...North Carolina...

Pigg River Near Pigg R Nr Sandy Level affecting Pittsylvania County
Roanoke (Staunton) River At Brookneal affecting Campbell...Charlotte
and Halifax Counties
Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and Halifax
Counties
Dan River Near Wentworth affecting Rockingham County
Dan River near Danville affecting Caswell...Rockingham...City of
Danville and Pittsylvania Counties
Yadkin River At Elkin affecting Surry and Yadkin Counties

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia..
Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County
Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County
Clinch River Near Richlands affecting Tazewell County
N. Fk. Holston River Near Saltville affecting Smyth County

Two to five inches of rain, with locally higher amounts have fallen across southwest Virginia and northern North Carolina since Wednesday night. Runoff from this
rainfall has caused significant rises and flooding along main stem rivers including
the Dan, New, Roanoke, Yadkin, Clinch, and North Fork of the Holston River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Dan River Near Wentworth.
* until late tonight.
* at 01AM Friday the stage was 24.0 feet and was cresting.
* Flood stage is 19.0 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by tonight.
* Impact...at 23.0 feet...Significant flooding throughout Dan River
valley.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 24.3
feet on Oct 12 2018.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Graphical forecast information is available on the internet at
http://www.weather.gov/rnk (lower case). Click on 'rivers & lakes'.

The next scheduled statement will be issued by noon.
